nodes.text: The Government House was the official residence of the Governor of Ord Mantell. A towering, palatial building located at the heart of Government Circle, the federal district of the planet's capital city of Worlport, Government House was designed with the Corellian classic-revival architectural style in mind. The central government of the planet operated within and around the Government House to ensure the smooth flow of political agendas. In 25 ABY, the Conclave on the Plight of the Refugees was hosted at the Government House.
